author: Ting Liu and Samira Shaikh and Tomek Strzalkowski and Aaron Broadwell and Jennifer Stromer-Galley and Sarah Taylor and Umit Boz and Xiaoai Ren and Jingsi Wu
title: Extending the MPC corpus to Chinese and Urdu - A Multiparty Multi-Lingual Chat Corpus for Modeling Social Phenomena in Language
